channel.title: LarsRoettig.dev
channel.description: A blog about Software and Magento Development

item.title: How I learned React?
item.description: What you should know before starting a React Project? My personal learning path to tame the technology stack.

item.title: Getting started with Magento PWA Studio
item.description: Is PWA the right technology for me from a business point? The second part will show how you can build your own PWA Theme for Magento 2.

item.title: Demystified Magento PWA Studio Checkout
item.description: What you should know before starting build a Payment Method for PWA Studio.

item.title: Getting started with PWA Studio Extensibility
item.description: In this tutorial I want to show how you can use the PWA Studio Extensibility framework.

item.title: How to create a GraphQL Endpoint for Magento 2.3
item.description: In this Magento 2 GraphQL Tutorial, I will show how to build a GraphQL API endpoint and extend it with a custom filter logic.

item.title: A Review of Magento PWA Studio
item.description: Is PWA Studio ready or not, and what we should know before starting a project. I would like to have a look at that with you.

item.title: How to write proper Software Documentation?
item.description: Is documentation essential or not, and what we should know about this topic. I share my knowledge to help you write better software documentation.

item.title: Book Review of Object Design Style Guide by Matthias Noback
item.description: Book Review Object Design Style Guide by Matthias Noback. It contains tips and facts to building software objects the way every developer should.

item.title: How to create a GraphQL Mutation Endpoint for Magento 2.3
item.description: How to build a Mutation Endpoint with GraphQL for Magento 2.3. In this tutorial, we will extend our query endpoint with saving logic.

item.title: Enable Notify me when this product is in stock in Magento 2
item.description: In this tutorial, I show how to enable Notify me when the product back is in stock for Magento 2

item.title: Getting started with software quality
item.description: For me, they are four crucial pillars to make sure you get fewer blocker tickets
